name: Rangamati Science and Technology
title: Explore Your Creativity and Talent with Green Valley Science College
subtitle: Unleash your imagination and develop unique skills through engaging courses, inspiring faculty, and an environment that nurtures your dreams into reality.

campusInformation.description: Green Valley Science College offers a vibrant academic environment with modern classrooms, advanced laboratories, research centers, and cultural hubs that encourage students to grow both academically and socially.

campusLife.title: Art & Culture
campusLife.subtitle: A celebration of diversity, music, drama, and art.

campusLife.title: Athletics & Fitness
campusLife.subtitle: Encouraging healthy competition and teamwork.

campusLife.title: Student Clubs & Societies
campusLife.subtitle: Opportunities to explore interests, skills, and leadership.

healthCare.title: 24/7 Medical Service
healthCare.description: On-campus healthcare center with professional doctors and nurses.

healthCare.title: Mental Health Support
healthCare.description: Counseling and guidance services to ensure student well-being.

healthCare.title: Nutrition & Wellness
healthCare.description: Guidance on healthy eating habits and lifestyle management.

researchPapers.title: Sustainable Agriculture in Coastal Bangladesh
researchPapers.description: Research on how modern agricultural methods can improve food security in coastal regions.

researchPapers.title: AI in Education
researchPapers.description: Study on how Artificial Intelligence can improve personalized learning for students.

researchPapers.title: Renewable Energy Solutions
researchPapers.description: Exploring new energy technologies to reduce carbon footprint.
